verbs.description: [ARG0: CNN political commentator and USA Today columnist Kirsten Powers] [V: wore] [ARG1: her disdain for Trump supporters and middle America] [ARGM-LOC: on her sleeve] [ARGM-TMP: during Wednesday night ’s Anderson Cooper 360] , [ARGM-ADV: as she berated them and President Trump for playing the victim] .

CNN political commentator and USA Today columnist Kirsten Powers wore her disdain for Trump supporters and middle America on her sleeve during Wednesday night ’s Anderson Cooper 360 , as [ARG0: she] [V: berated] [ARG1: them and President Trump] [ARG2: for playing the victim] .

CNN political commentator and USA Today columnist Kirsten Powers wore her disdain for Trump supporters and middle America on her sleeve during Wednesday night ’s Anderson Cooper 360 , as she berated [ARG0: them and President Trump] for [V: playing] [ARG1: the victim] .
